tourBios.carHigh:
2015: After claiming medalist honors at the Sebring, FL Q-School to secure full status on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, he went on to collect two top-5s and six 25s in 15 starts (12 cuts made) to finish the season ranked 43rd on the Order of Merit… His best performance of the year and his career on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica was T4 at the Dominican Republic Open in June… Made it back-to-back top-5s with a T5 finish at the All You Need is Ecuador Open in September… His lowest round of the season, a 7-under 65 during the second round of the Lexus Panama Classic, featured a hole-in-one at Buenaventura GC's par-3 No. 14, where he hit a 4-iron from 194 yards.

2014: Relaying mostly on sponsor exemptions, he made the cut in five of eight starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His best of two top-25s was T14 at the Aberto do Brasil in November. Finished 108th on the Order of Merit.

2013: His best of two top-25s in 14 PGA TOUR Latinoamérica starts was T20 at the TransAmerican Power Products CRV Open in Guadalajara, Mexico in March. Finished 101st on the Order of Merit.

2012: Only top-25 in 11 starts during the inaugural season of PGA TOUR Latinoamérica was T21 at the Dominican Republic Open. Finished the year ranked 72nd on the Order of Merit.

2011: Started his career as a pro competing on the Tour de las Américas, where he claimed a valuable runner-up finish at the season ending 106th VISA Open de Argentina in December. That results helped him finish the TLA season ranked 28th on Order of Merit to secure his card for the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica inaugural season in 2012… Also played in Florida's Minor League Tour, where he had four runner-up finishes between 2011 and 2013.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: As a member of the Barry University golf team he won ten tournaments in the Sunshine State Conference competing in the NCAA's Division II. Represented the Dominican Republic in the 2010 World Amateur Team Championship in Argentina
tourBios.personal: Twitter name is @pumagolf23… Instagram name is @willypumarol

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri in 2016 is T25th at the Lexus Panama Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 54th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Latinoamérica.
